app_descript:
Brief

Signal enhances your communication comfort with the highest level of privacy and encryption. Known for putting security at the forefront, Signal's latest update brings the all-new Stories feature to both iOS and Android users, where you can share your fleeting moments with expiring images, videos, and texts. Stay connected, stay secure with Signal.
